## A Slide with Custom Styling
## Water Insecurity Animation

```{=html}
<div style="width: 300px; margin: auto;">
  <svg viewBox="0 0 120 120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" >
    <style>
      /* Droplet animation: fall + fade */
      .droplet {
        fill: #1B9FAB;
        transform-origin: 60px 20px;
        animation: drop-fall 3s infinite ease-in-out;
      }
      @keyframes drop-fall {
        0% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
        80% { transform: translateY(70px); opacity: 1; }
        90% { opacity: 0; }
        100% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 0; }
      }

      /* Ground crack pulse */
      .crack {
        stroke: #8B4513;
        stroke-width: 2;
        fill: none;
        transform-origin: 60px 110px;
        animation: crack-pulse 3s infinite ease-in-out;
      }
      @keyframes crack-pulse {
        0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1) scaleY(1); opacity: 1; }
        50% { transform: scaleX(1.2) scaleY(1.2); opacity: 0.6; }
      }

      /* Tap */
      .tap {
        fill: #555;
      }
    </style>

    <!-- Tap -->
    <rect class="tap" x="50" y="0" width="20" height="30" rx="4" ry="4" />
    <rect class="tap" x="58" y="30" width="4" height="10" rx="2" ry="2" />

    <!-- Droplet -->
    <circle class="droplet" cx="60" cy="20" r="6" />

    <!-- Ground line -->
    <line x1="0" y1="110" x2="120" y2="110" stroke="#654321" stroke-width="4" />

    <!-- Cracks -->
    <path class="crack" d="M40 110 L50 100 L60 110" />
    <path class="crack" d="M80 110 L70 100 L60 110" />
  </svg>
</div>

```
